name: scop/custom_header
description: This plugin allows you to add a header panel with up to three content blocks. Each providing an image icon and a customizable link and text

description.de-DE: Dieses Plugin erlaubt es einen Header-Block zu erstellen, mit bis zu drei Individualisierbaren Bild-Icons und Link-Texten
description.en-GB: This plugin allows you to add a header panel with up to three content blocks. Each providing an image icon and a customizable link and text
